text: Arthur Allman (24 December 1890 – 22 December 1956) was an English footballer. His regular position was at full back. He was born in Milton, Staffordshire. He played for Manchester United, Shrewsbury Town, Wolverhampton Wanderers (though never in a first team fixture), Swansea Town, Stoke (as a guest during the First World War), and Millwall Athletic. ==Career statistics== Source: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|FA Cup !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Wolverhampton Wanderers |1912–13 |Second Division |0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |Manchester United |1914–15 |First Division |12||0||0||0||12||0 |- |Millwall |1920–21 |Third Division South |6||0||0||0||6||0 |- |rowspan=2|Crewe Alexandra |1922–23 |Third Division North |17||0||2||0||19||0 |- |1923–24 |Third Division North |5||0||1||0||6||0 |- !colspan=3|Career total !40!!0!!3!!0!!43!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1890 births Category:1956 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Shrewsbury Town F.C. players Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Stoke City F.C. wartime guest players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Aberaman Athletic F.C. players Category:Crewe Alexandra F.C. players
